 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשַׁק‎</span> **verb** ==oppress, wrong, extort== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשַׁק‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew, so Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עשק‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***accuse, slander***; Assyrian adjective <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***eš‡u***</u></abbr>, ***strong***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***roughness, injustice***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Lev.5.21|Lev 5:21]]; [[Ezek.18.18|Ezek 18:18]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשַׁקְתָּ֫נוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.12.4|1Sam 12:4]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַשׁקֻנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.122|Ps 119:122]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעֲשֹׁק‎</span> [[Lev.19.13|Lev 19:13]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשֹׁק‎</span> [[Hos.12.8|Hos 12:8]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשְׁקָם‎</span> [[1Chr.16.21|1Chr 16:21]]; [[Ps.105.14|Ps 105:14]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשֵׁק‎</span> [[Prov.14.31|Prov 14:31]] +, feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעשְׁקוֺת‎</span> [[Amos.4.1|Amos 4:1]], etc.; ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשׁוּק‎</span> [[Deut.28.29|Deut 28:29]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***oppress, wrong*** (often by extortion, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּזַל‎</span>), with accusative of person [[1Sam.12.3|1Sam 12:3]]; [[1Sam.12.4|1Sam 12:4]]; [[Mic.2.2|Mic 2:2]]; [[Lev.5.21|Lev 5:21]]; [[Lev.19.13|Lev 19:13]] especially the poor and helpless [[Amos.4.1|Amos 4:1]]; [[Deut.24.14|Deut 24:14]]; [[Jer.7.6|Jer 7:6]]; [[Ezek.22.29|Ezek 22:29]]; [[Zech.7.10|Zech 7:10]]; [[Prov.14.31|Prov 14:31]]; [[Prov.22.16|Prov 22:16]]; [[Prov.28.3|Prov 28:3]]; [[Eccl.4.1|Eccl 4:1]] also with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשֶׁק (וְ)גָזַל גָּזֵל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Ezek.18.18|Ezek 18:18]] ***practise extortion***, [[Ezek.22.29|Ezek 22:29]], ***take by extortion*** [[Lev.5.23|Lev 5:23]] and (with accusative of thing) [[Mal.3.5|Mal 3:5]] absolute [[Hos.12.8|Hos 12:8]] ***practise extortion***; [[Job.10.3|Job 10:3]] ***deal tyrannically*** (of God); participle ***oppressor, extortioner*** [[Jer.21.12|Jer 21:12]]; [[Ps.72.4|Ps 72:4]]; [[Eccl.4.1|Eccl 4:1]] passive participle as substantive ***the oppressed*** [[Ps.103.6|Ps 103:6]]; [[Ps.146.7|Ps 146:7]]. 

**2.** ***oppress*** a nation [[Isa.52.4|Isa 52:4]], compare [[Ps.105.14|Ps 105:14]] = [[1Chr.16.21|1Chr 16:21]]; [[Ps.119.122|Ps 119:122]], participle act. ***oppressor*** v[[Ps.119.121|Ps 119:121]], passive participle ***oppressed*** [[Jer.50.33|Jer 50:33]], in predict. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְגָזוּל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Deut.28.29|Deut 28:29]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָצּוּץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> v[[Deut.28.23|Deut 28:23]]; [[Hos.5.11|Hos 5:11]]. 

**3.** dubious are: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְשֹׁק נָהָר‎</span> [[Job.40.23|Job 40:23]] ***a river oppresses*** him, i.e. rushes violently upon him (that is, the hippopotamus; [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשֹׁק‎</span>, from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּק‎</span>; &gt; [[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁקַע‎</span> ***falls, sinks***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשֻׁק בְּדַם נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> [[Prov.28.17|Prov 28:17]] ***oppressed (? burdened)*** with the blood of a person. **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּעֻשָּׁקָה‎</span> [[Isa.23.12|Isa 23:12]] ***crushed*** (of conquered Sidon under figure of woman).
